headline: A Web Post, A Lost Job And a Furor Over Speech
abstract: Days after Asheen Phansey posted what he said were sarcastic suggestions of American sites that Iran could target for bombings, he was fired from Babson College in Massachusetts.
lead_paragraph: The free-speech nonprofit PEN America called on Wednesday for the reinstatement of a worker who was fired this month from a Massachusetts college after posting what he said were sarcastic suggestions of American targets that Iran could bomb.
